projects.name: EzShop [2026]
projects.description: EZShop is a retail management system designed to handle the end-to-end operations of a small to medium-sized shop, integrating user management, inventory control, sales, orders, and accounting functions into a single platform. EZShop defines a set of business operations that orchestrates user interactions, product lifecycle, and financial transactions.

projects.name: Maze Navigation Problem [2025]
projects.description: My thesis, 'Analysis of Optimal Navigation Strategies for Autonomous Exploration in Unknown Environments', studies how autonomous agents navigate mazes using strategies like Random Walk, Wall Follower, Tremaux, and Adaptive Walk. Simulations show Adaptive Walk excels in efficiency and success, with applications in robotics, autonomous vehicles, and multi-agent exploration systems.

projects.name: Linux Terminal Simulation [2024]
projects.description: University project web-based terminal built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Features real-time clock, resizable and closable window, and basic commands like clear, whoami, curl, time, exit, help, and user (to change username). Designed to simulate a lightweight interactive terminal experience in the browser.

projects.description: University project built with Express, Socket.IO, and npm. The app allows users to log in and see in real time who else is connected, enabling instant chat within the same network. Designed to demonstrate real-time communication and multi-user interaction.

projects.name: Brain Test Quiz Bot [2023]
projects.description: Brain Test Quiz Bot is a Telegram bot that challenges users' intelligence and cognitive skills through a variety of quizzes and puzzles. It covers grammar, logic, math, and general knowledge, offering three difficulty levels with timers: Easy (10s), Medium (7s), and Hard (5s), providing a fun and engaging learning experience.

projects.name: Database Cinema System [2023]
projects.description: Cinema Database System is designed to track cinema operations, including screening rooms, ticket and snack sales, staff shifts, and customer feedback. It ensures seat availability, manages sales transactions, updates snack pricing, and calculates daily revenue. The system also stores film details and aggregates anonymous reviews for informed movie selection.

projects.name: Hangman Game [2022]
projects.description: Hangman Game is a Python-based interactive word-guessing game. Users try to reveal a hidden word by selecting letters, with a limited number of lives. The program handles input validation, dynamically updates the word display, and selects random words from a list, offering an engaging command-line gaming experience.
